reviewText: Purely entertaining  If you like Mark Lowry I recommend this video
If you like good clean comedy get this.  He is hysterical without using bad language

If you enjoy the Christian comedy of Mark Lowry, then you'll enjoy his first video. The way this one is different from the others is that it doesn't contain spoof songs. Depending on your personal taste, you could consider that good or bad.
It was in excellent condition and arrived at a very reasonable time.  I highly recommend this video as it is clean and funny.
This guy is a total natural! And it's all about his life as a kid!  You think your kids difficult? You may just have an angel!
This comedy video is so funny and entertaining. I never get tired of watching it
